name: RecordScreen-iOS9-
summary: RecordScreen-iOS9+ is a project which implements screen recording in iOS9 and above.
description:
RecordScreen-iOS9+ is a project which implements screen recording in iOS9 and above.a.Its features are given below:
    a.A video recording your screen in your app with ReplayKit.
    b.Red dots indicating user action.
    c.A log file for user action locating in the /path-to-your-app's-document-directory/nkrecordscreen/log.txt.
